00001 
00002 # The following YAML grammar is LL(1) and is parsed by a recursive descent
00003 # parser.
00004 #
00005 # stream            ::= STREAM-START implicit_document? explicit_document* STREAM-END
00006 # implicit_document ::= block_node DOCUMENT-END*
00007 # explicit_document ::= DIRECTIVE* DOCUMENT-START block_node? DOCUMENT-END*
00008 # block_node_or_indentless_sequence ::=
00009 #                       ALIAS
00010 #                       | properties (block_content | indentless_block_sequence)?
00011 #                       | block_content
00012 #                       | indentless_block_sequence
00013 # block_node        ::= ALIAS
00014 #                       | properties block_content?
00015 #                       | block_content
00016 # flow_node         ::= ALIAS
00017 #                       | properties flow_content?
00018 #                       | flow_content
00019 # properties        ::= TAG ANCHOR? | ANCHOR TAG?
00020 # block_content     ::= block_collection | flow_collection | SCALAR
00021 # flow_content      ::= flow_collection | SCALAR
00022 # block_collection  ::= block_sequence | block_mapping
00023 # flow_collection   ::= flow_sequence | flow_mapping
00024 # block_sequence    ::= BLOCK-SEQUENCE-START (BLOCK-ENTRY block_node?)* BLOCK-END
00025 # indentless_sequence   ::= (BLOCK-ENTRY block_node?)+
00026 # block_mapping     ::= BLOCK-MAPPING_START
00027 #                       ((KEY block_node_or_indentless_sequence?)?
00028 #                       (VALUE block_node_or_indentless_sequence?)?)*
00029 #                       BLOCK-END
00030 # flow_sequence     ::= FLOW-SEQUENCE-START
00031 #                       (flow_sequence_entry FLOW-ENTRY)*
00032 #                       flow_sequence_entry?
00033 #                       FLOW-SEQUENCE-END
00034 # flow_sequence_entry   ::= flow_node | KEY flow_node? (VALUE flow_node?)?
00035 # flow_mapping      ::= FLOW-MAPPING-START
00036 #                       (flow_mapping_entry FLOW-ENTRY)*
00037 #                       flow_mapping_entry?
00038 #                       FLOW-MAPPING-END
00039 # flow_mapping_entry    ::= flow_node | KEY flow_node? (VALUE flow_node?)?
00040 #
00041 # FIRST sets:
00042 #
00043 # stream: { STREAM-START }
00044 # explicit_document: { DIRECTIVE DOCUMENT-START }
00045 # implicit_document: FIRST(block_node)
00046 # block_node: { ALIAS TAG ANCHOR SCALAR BLOCK-SEQUENCE-START BLOCK-MAPPING-START FLOW-SEQUENCE-START FLOW-MAPPING-START }
00047 # flow_node: { ALIAS ANCHOR TAG SCALAR FLOW-SEQUENCE-START FLOW-MAPPING-START }
00048 # block_content: { BLOCK-SEQUENCE-START BLOCK-MAPPING-START FLOW-SEQUENCE-START FLOW-MAPPING-START SCALAR }
00049 # flow_content: { FLOW-SEQUENCE-START FLOW-MAPPING-START SCALAR }
00050 # block_collection: { BLOCK-SEQUENCE-START BLOCK-MAPPING-START }
00051 # flow_collection: { FLOW-SEQUENCE-START FLOW-MAPPING-START }
00052 # block_sequence: { BLOCK-SEQUENCE-START }
00053 # block_mapping: { BLOCK-MAPPING-START }
00054 # block_node_or_indentless_sequence: { ALIAS ANCHOR TAG SCALAR BLOCK-SEQUENCE-START BLOCK-MAPPING-START FLOW-SEQUENCE-START FLOW-MAPPING-START BLOCK-ENTRY }
00055 # indentless_sequence: { ENTRY }
00056 # flow_collection: { FLOW-SEQUENCE-START FLOW-MAPPING-START }
00057 # flow_sequence: { FLOW-SEQUENCE-START }
00058 # flow_mapping: { FLOW-MAPPING-START }
00059 # flow_sequence_entry: { ALIAS ANCHOR TAG SCALAR FLOW-SEQUENCE-START FLOW-MAPPING-START KEY }
00060 # flow_mapping_entry: { ALIAS ANCHOR TAG SCALAR FLOW-SEQUENCE-START FLOW-MAPPING-START KEY }
00061 
00062 __all__ = ['Parser', 'ParserError']
00063 
00064 from error import MarkedYAMLError
00065 from tokens import *
00066 from events import *
00067 from scanner import *
00068 
00069 class ParserError(MarkedYAMLError):
00070     pass
00071 
00072 class Parser(object):
00073     # Since writing a recursive-descendant parser is a straightforward task, we
00074     # do not give many comments here.
00075     # Note that we use Python generators. If you rewrite the parser in another
00076     # language, you may replace all 'yield'-s with event handler calls.
00077 
00078     DEFAULT_TAGS = {
00079         u'!':   u'!',
00080         u'!!':  u'tag:yaml.org,2002:',
00081     }
00082 
00083     def __init__(self):
00084         self.current_event = None
00085         self.yaml_version = None
00086         self.tag_handles = {}
00087         self.states = []
00088         self.marks = []
00089         self.state = self.parse_stream_start
00090 
00091     def check_event(self, *choices):
00092         # Check the type of the next event.
00093         if self.current_event is None:
00094             if self.state:
00095                 self.current_event = self.state()
00096         if self.current_event is not None:
00097             if not choices:
00098                 return True
00099             for choice in choices:
00100                 if isinstance(self.current_event, choice):
00101                     return True
00102         return False
00103 
00104     def peek_event(self):
00105         # Get the next event.
00106         if self.current_event is None:
00107             if self.state:
00108                 self.current_event = self.state()
00109         return self.current_event
00110 
00111     def get_event(self):
00112         # Get the next event and proceed further.
00113         if self.current_event is None:
00114             if self.state:
00115                 self.current_event = self.state()
00116         value = self.current_event
00117         self.current_event = None
00118         return value
00119 
00120     # stream    ::= STREAM-START implicit_document? explicit_document* STREAM-END
00121     # implicit_document ::= block_node DOCUMENT-END*
00122     # explicit_document ::= DIRECTIVE* DOCUMENT-START block_node? DOCUMENT-END*
00123 
00124     def parse_stream_start(self):
00125 
00126         # Parse the stream start.
00127         token = self.get_token()
00128         event = StreamStartEvent(token.start_mark, token.end_mark,
00129                 encoding=token.encoding)
00130 
00131         # Prepare the next state.
00132         self.state = self.parse_implicit_document_start
00133 
00134         return event
00135 
00136     def parse_implicit_document_start(self):
00137 
00138         # Parse an implicit document.
00139         if not self.check_token(DirectiveToken, DocumentStartToken,
00140                 StreamEndToken):
00141             self.tag_handles = self.DEFAULT_TAGS
00142             token = self.peek_token()
00143             start_mark = end_mark = token.start_mark
00144             event = DocumentStartEvent(start_mark, end_mark,
00145                     explicit=False)
00146 
00147             # Prepare the next state.
00148             self.states.append(self.parse_document_end)
00149             self.state = self.parse_block_node
00150 
00151             return event
00152 
00153         else:
00154             return self.parse_document_start()
00155 
00156     def parse_document_start(self):
00157 
00158         # Parse any extra document end indicators.
00159         while self.check_token(DocumentEndToken):
00160             self.get_token()
00161 
00162         # Parse an explicit document.
00163         if not self.check_token(StreamEndToken):
00164             token = self.peek_token()
00165             start_mark = token.start_mark
00166             version, tags = self.process_directives()
00167             if not self.check_token(DocumentStartToken):
00168                 raise ParserError(None, None,
00169                         "expected '<document start>', but found %r"
00170                         % self.peek_token().id,
00171                         self.peek_token().start_mark)
00172             token = self.get_token()
00173             end_mark = token.end_mark
00174             event = DocumentStartEvent(start_mark, end_mark,
00175                     explicit=True, version=version, tags=tags)
00176             self.states.append(self.parse_document_end)
00177             self.state = self.parse_document_content
00178         else:
00179             # Parse the end of the stream.
00180             token = self.get_token()
00181             event = StreamEndEvent(token.start_mark, token.end_mark)
00182             assert not self.states
00183             assert not self.marks
00184             self.state = None
00185         return event
00186 
00187     def parse_document_end(self):
00188 
00189         # Parse the document end.
00190         token = self.peek_token()
00191         start_mark = end_mark = token.start_mark
00192         explicit = False
00193         if self.check_token(DocumentEndToken):
00194             token = self.get_token()
00195             end_mark = token.end_mark
00196             explicit = True
00197         event = DocumentEndEvent(start_mark, end_mark,
00198                 explicit=explicit)
00199 
00200         # Prepare the next state.
00201         self.state = self.parse_document_start
00202 
00203         return event
00204 
00205     def parse_document_content(self):
00206         if self.check_token(DirectiveToken,
00207                 DocumentStartToken, DocumentEndToken, StreamEndToken):
00208             event = self.process_empty_scalar(self.peek_token().start_mark)
00209             self.state = self.states.pop()
00210             return event
00211         else:
00212             return self.parse_block_node()
00213 
00214     def process_directives(self):
00215         self.yaml_version = None
00216         self.tag_handles = {}
00217         while self.check_token(DirectiveToken):
00218             token = self.get_token()
00219             if token.name == u'YAML':
00220                 if self.yaml_version is not None:
00221                     raise ParserError(None, None,
00222                             "found duplicate YAML directive", token.start_mark)
00223                 major, minor = token.value
00224                 if major != 1:
00225                     raise ParserError(None, None,
00226                             "found incompatible YAML document (version 1.* is required)",
00227                             token.start_mark)
00228                 self.yaml_version = token.value
00229             elif token.name == u'TAG':
00230                 handle, prefix = token.value
00231                 if handle in self.tag_handles:
00232                     raise ParserError(None, None,
00233                             "duplicate tag handle %r" % handle.encode('utf-8'),
00234                             token.start_mark)
00235                 self.tag_handles[handle] = prefix
00236         if self.tag_handles:
00237             value = self.yaml_version, self.tag_handles.copy()
00238         else:
00239             value = self.yaml_version, None
00240         for key in self.DEFAULT_TAGS:
00241             if key not in self.tag_handles:
00242                 self.tag_handles[key] = self.DEFAULT_TAGS[key]
00243         return value
00244 
00245     # block_node_or_indentless_sequence ::= ALIAS
00246     #               | properties (block_content | indentless_block_sequence)?
00247     #               | block_content
00248     #               | indentless_block_sequence
00249     # block_node    ::= ALIAS
00250     #                   | properties block_content?
00251     #                   | block_content
00252     # flow_node     ::= ALIAS
00253     #                   | properties flow_content?
00254     #                   | flow_content
00255     # properties    ::= TAG ANCHOR? | ANCHOR TAG?
00256     # block_content     ::= block_collection | flow_collection | SCALAR
00257     # flow_content      ::= flow_collection | SCALAR
00258     # block_collection  ::= block_sequence | block_mapping
00259     # flow_collection   ::= flow_sequence | flow_mapping
00260 
00261     def parse_block_node(self):
00262         return self.parse_node(block=True)
00263 
00264     def parse_flow_node(self):
00265         return self.parse_node()
00266 
00267     def parse_block_node_or_indentless_sequence(self):
00268         return self.parse_node(block=True, indentless_sequence=True)
00269 
00270     def parse_node(self, block=False, indentless_sequence=False):
00271         if self.check_token(AliasToken):
00272             token = self.get_token()
00273             event = AliasEvent(token.value, token.start_mark, token.end_mark)
00274             self.state = self.states.pop()
00275         else:
00276             anchor = None
00277             tag = None
00278             start_mark = end_mark = tag_mark = None
00279             if self.check_token(AnchorToken):
00280                 token = self.get_token()
00281                 start_mark = token.start_mark
00282                 end_mark = token.end_mark
00283                 anchor = token.value
00284                 if self.check_token(TagToken):
00285                     token = self.get_token()
00286                     tag_mark = token.start_mark
00287                     end_mark = token.end_mark
00288                     tag = token.value
00289             elif self.check_token(TagToken):
00290                 token = self.get_token()
00291                 start_mark = tag_mark = token.start_mark
00292                 end_mark = token.end_mark
00293                 tag = token.value
00294                 if self.check_token(AnchorToken):
00295                     token = self.get_token()
00296                     end_mark = token.end_mark
00297                     anchor = token.value
00298             if tag is not None:
00299                 handle, suffix = tag
00300                 if handle is not None:
00301                     if handle not in self.tag_handles:
00302                         raise ParserError("while parsing a node", start_mark,
00303                                 "found undefined tag handle %r" % handle.encode('utf-8'),
00304                                 tag_mark)
00305                     tag = self.tag_handles[handle]+suffix
00306                 else:
00307                     tag = suffix
00308             #if tag == u'!':
00309             #    raise ParserError("while parsing a node", start_mark,
00310             #            "found non-specific tag '!'", tag_mark,
00311             #            "Please check 'http://pyyaml.org/wiki/YAMLNonSpecificTag' and share your opinion.")
00312             if start_mark is None:
00313                 start_mark = end_mark = self.peek_token().start_mark
00314             event = None
00315             implicit = (tag is None or tag == u'!')
00316             if indentless_sequence and self.check_token(BlockEntryToken):
00317                 end_mark = self.peek_token().end_mark
00318                 event = SequenceStartEvent(anchor, tag, implicit,
00319                         start_mark, end_mark)
00320                 self.state = self.parse_indentless_sequence_entry
00321             else:
00322                 if self.check_token(ScalarToken):
00323                     token = self.get_token()
00324                     end_mark = token.end_mark
00325                     if (token.plain and tag is None) or tag == u'!':
00326                         implicit = (True, False)
00327                     elif tag is None:
00328                         implicit = (False, True)
00329                     else:
00330                         implicit = (False, False)
00331                     event = ScalarEvent(anchor, tag, implicit, token.value,
00332                             start_mark, end_mark, style=token.style)
00333                     self.state = self.states.pop()
00334                 elif self.check_token(FlowSequenceStartToken):
00335                     end_mark = self.peek_token().end_mark
00336                     event = SequenceStartEvent(anchor, tag, implicit,
00337                             start_mark, end_mark, flow_style=True)
00338                     self.state = self.parse_flow_sequence_first_entry
00339                 elif self.check_token(FlowMappingStartToken):
00340                     end_mark = self.peek_token().end_mark
00341                     event = MappingStartEvent(anchor, tag, implicit,
00342                             start_mark, end_mark, flow_style=True)
00343                     self.state = self.parse_flow_mapping_first_key
00344                 elif block and self.check_token(BlockSequenceStartToken):
00345                     end_mark = self.peek_token().start_mark
00346                     event = SequenceStartEvent(anchor, tag, implicit,
00347                             start_mark, end_mark, flow_style=False)
00348                     self.state = self.parse_block_sequence_first_entry
00349                 elif block and self.check_token(BlockMappingStartToken):
00350                     end_mark = self.peek_token().start_mark
00351                     event = MappingStartEvent(anchor, tag, implicit,
00352                             start_mark, end_mark, flow_style=False)
00353                     self.state = self.parse_block_mapping_first_key
00354                 elif anchor is not None or tag is not None:
00355                     # Empty scalars are allowed even if a tag or an anchor is
00356                     # specified.
00357                     event = ScalarEvent(anchor, tag, (implicit, False), u'',
00358                             start_mark, end_mark)
00359                     self.state = self.states.pop()
00360                 else:
00361                     if block:
00362                         node = 'block'
00363                     else:
00364                         node = 'flow'
00365                     token = self.peek_token()
00366                     raise ParserError("while parsing a %s node" % node, start_mark,
00367                             "expected the node content, but found %r" % token.id,
00368                             token.start_mark)
00369         return event
00370 
00371     # block_sequence ::= BLOCK-SEQUENCE-START (BLOCK-ENTRY block_node?)* BLOCK-END
00372 
00373     def parse_block_sequence_first_entry(self):
00374         token = self.get_token()
00375         self.marks.append(token.start_mark)
00376         return self.parse_block_sequence_entry()
00377 
00378     def parse_block_sequence_entry(self):
00379         if self.check_token(BlockEntryToken):
00380             token = self.get_token()
00381             if not self.check_token(BlockEntryToken, BlockEndToken):
00382                 self.states.append(self.parse_block_sequence_entry)
00383                 return self.parse_block_node()
00384             else:
00385                 self.state = self.parse_block_sequence_entry
00386                 return self.process_empty_scalar(token.end_mark)
00387         if not self.check_token(BlockEndToken):
00388             token = self.peek_token()
00389             raise ParserError("while parsing a block collection", self.marks[-1],
00390                     "expected <block end>, but found %r" % token.id, token.start_mark)
00391         token = self.get_token()
00392         event = SequenceEndEvent(token.start_mark, token.end_mark)
00393         self.state = self.states.pop()
00394         self.marks.pop()
00395         return event
00396 
00397     # indentless_sequence ::= (BLOCK-ENTRY block_node?)+
00398 
00399     def parse_indentless_sequence_entry(self):
00400         if self.check_token(BlockEntryToken):
00401             token = self.get_token()
00402             if not self.check_token(BlockEntryToken,
00403                     KeyToken, ValueToken, BlockEndToken):
00404                 self.states.append(self.parse_indentless_sequence_entry)
00405                 return self.parse_block_node()
00406             else:
00407                 self.state = self.parse_indentless_sequence_entry
00408                 return self.process_empty_scalar(token.end_mark)
00409         token = self.peek_token()
00410         event = SequenceEndEvent(token.start_mark, token.start_mark)
00411         self.state = self.states.pop()
00412         return event
00413 
00414     # block_mapping     ::= BLOCK-MAPPING_START
00415     #                       ((KEY block_node_or_indentless_sequence?)?
00416     #                       (VALUE block_node_or_indentless_sequence?)?)*
00417     #                       BLOCK-END
00418 
00419     def parse_block_mapping_first_key(self):
00420         token = self.get_token()
00421         self.marks.append(token.start_mark)
00422         return self.parse_block_mapping_key()
00423 
00424     def parse_block_mapping_key(self):
00425         if self.check_token(KeyToken):
00426             token = self.get_token()
00427             if not self.check_token(KeyToken, ValueToken, BlockEndToken):
00428                 self.states.append(self.parse_block_mapping_value)
00429                 return self.parse_block_node_or_indentless_sequence()
00430             else:
00431                 self.state = self.parse_block_mapping_value
00432                 return self.process_empty_scalar(token.end_mark)
00433         if not self.check_token(BlockEndToken):
00434             token = self.peek_token()
00435             raise ParserError("while parsing a block mapping", self.marks[-1],
00436                     "expected <block end>, but found %r" % token.id, token.start_mark)
00437         token = self.get_token()
00438         event = MappingEndEvent(token.start_mark, token.end_mark)
00439         self.state = self.states.pop()
00440         self.marks.pop()
00441         return event
00442 
00443     def parse_block_mapping_value(self):
00444         if self.check_token(ValueToken):
00445             token = self.get_token()
00446             if not self.check_token(KeyToken, ValueToken, BlockEndToken):
00447                 self.states.append(self.parse_block_mapping_key)
00448                 return self.parse_block_node_or_indentless_sequence()
00449             else:
00450                 self.state = self.parse_block_mapping_key
00451                 return self.process_empty_scalar(token.end_mark)
00452         else:
00453             self.state = self.parse_block_mapping_key
00454             token = self.peek_token()
00455             return self.process_empty_scalar(token.start_mark)
00456 
00457     # flow_sequence     ::= FLOW-SEQUENCE-START
00458     #                       (flow_sequence_entry FLOW-ENTRY)*
00459     #                       flow_sequence_entry?
00460     #                       FLOW-SEQUENCE-END
00461     # flow_sequence_entry   ::= flow_node | KEY flow_node? (VALUE flow_node?)?
00462     #
00463     # Note that while production rules for both flow_sequence_entry and
00464     # flow_mapping_entry are equal, their interpretations are different.
00465     # For `flow_sequence_entry`, the part `KEY flow_node? (VALUE flow_node?)?`
00466     # generate an inline mapping (set syntax).
00467 
00468     def parse_flow_sequence_first_entry(self):
00469         token = self.get_token()
00470         self.marks.append(token.start_mark)
00471         return self.parse_flow_sequence_entry(first=True)
00472 
00473     def parse_flow_sequence_entry(self, first=False):
00474         if not self.check_token(FlowSequenceEndToken):
00475             if not first:
00476                 if self.check_token(FlowEntryToken):
00477                     self.get_token()
00478                 else:
00479                     token = self.peek_token()
00480                     raise ParserError("while parsing a flow sequence", self.marks[-1],
00481                             "expected ',' or ']', but got %r" % token.id, token.start_mark)
00482             
00483             if self.check_token(KeyToken):
00484                 token = self.peek_token()
00485                 event = MappingStartEvent(None, None, True,
00486                         token.start_mark, token.end_mark,
00487                         flow_style=True)
00488                 self.state = self.parse_flow_sequence_entry_mapping_key
00489                 return event
00490             elif not self.check_token(FlowSequenceEndToken):
00491                 self.states.append(self.parse_flow_sequence_entry)
00492                 return self.parse_flow_node()
00493         token = self.get_token()
00494         event = SequenceEndEvent(token.start_mark, token.end_mark)
00495         self.state = self.states.pop()
00496         self.marks.pop()
00497         return event
00498 
00499     def parse_flow_sequence_entry_mapping_key(self):
00500         token = self.get_token()
00501         if not self.check_token(ValueToken,
00502                 FlowEntryToken, FlowSequenceEndToken):
00503             self.states.append(self.parse_flow_sequence_entry_mapping_value)
00504             return self.parse_flow_node()
00505         else:
00506             self.state = self.parse_flow_sequence_entry_mapping_value
00507             return self.process_empty_scalar(token.end_mark)
00508 
00509     def parse_flow_sequence_entry_mapping_value(self):
00510         if self.check_token(ValueToken):
00511             token = self.get_token()
00512             if not self.check_token(FlowEntryToken, FlowSequenceEndToken):
00513                 self.states.append(self.parse_flow_sequence_entry_mapping_end)
00514                 return self.parse_flow_node()
00515             else:
00516                 self.state = self.parse_flow_sequence_entry_mapping_end
00517                 return self.process_empty_scalar(token.end_mark)
00518         else:
00519             self.state = self.parse_flow_sequence_entry_mapping_end
00520             token = self.peek_token()
00521             return self.process_empty_scalar(token.start_mark)
00522 
00523     def parse_flow_sequence_entry_mapping_end(self):
00524         self.state = self.parse_flow_sequence_entry
00525         token = self.peek_token()
00526         return MappingEndEvent(token.start_mark, token.start_mark)
00527 
00528     # flow_mapping  ::= FLOW-MAPPING-START
00529     #                   (flow_mapping_entry FLOW-ENTRY)*
00530     #                   flow_mapping_entry?
00531     #                   FLOW-MAPPING-END
00532     # flow_mapping_entry    ::= flow_node | KEY flow_node? (VALUE flow_node?)?
00533 
00534     def parse_flow_mapping_first_key(self):
00535         token = self.get_token()
00536         self.marks.append(token.start_mark)
00537         return self.parse_flow_mapping_key(first=True)
00538 
00539     def parse_flow_mapping_key(self, first=False):
00540         if not self.check_token(FlowMappingEndToken):
00541             if not first:
00542                 if self.check_token(FlowEntryToken):
00543                     self.get_token()
00544                 else:
00545                     token = self.peek_token()
00546                     raise ParserError("while parsing a flow mapping", self.marks[-1],
00547                             "expected ',' or '}', but got %r" % token.id, token.start_mark)
00548             if self.check_token(KeyToken):
00549                 token = self.get_token()
00550                 if not self.check_token(ValueToken,
00551                         FlowEntryToken, FlowMappingEndToken):
00552                     self.states.append(self.parse_flow_mapping_value)
00553                     return self.parse_flow_node()
00554                 else:
00555                     self.state = self.parse_flow_mapping_value
00556                     return self.process_empty_scalar(token.end_mark)
00557             elif not self.check_token(FlowMappingEndToken):
00558                 self.states.append(self.parse_flow_mapping_empty_value)
00559                 return self.parse_flow_node()
00560         token = self.get_token()
00561         event = MappingEndEvent(token.start_mark, token.end_mark)
00562         self.state = self.states.pop()
00563         self.marks.pop()
00564         return event
00565 
00566     def parse_flow_mapping_value(self):
00567         if self.check_token(ValueToken):
00568             token = self.get_token()
00569             if not self.check_token(FlowEntryToken, FlowMappingEndToken):
00570                 self.states.append(self.parse_flow_mapping_key)
00571                 return self.parse_flow_node()
00572             else:
00573                 self.state = self.parse_flow_mapping_key
00574                 return self.process_empty_scalar(token.end_mark)
00575         else:
00576             self.state = self.parse_flow_mapping_key
00577             token = self.peek_token()
00578             return self.process_empty_scalar(token.start_mark)
00579 
00580     def parse_flow_mapping_empty_value(self):
00581         self.state = self.parse_flow_mapping_key
00582         return self.process_empty_scalar(self.peek_token().start_mark)
00583 
00584     def process_empty_scalar(self, mark):
00585         return ScalarEvent(None, None, (True, False), u'', mark, mark)
00586
